data.actual_result: The showed text is in the previous language you set the app
data.expected_result: The showed text should be in actual language
data.short_description: Text showed when you drag your mouse over server owner's crown is in another language
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel where a server owner's crown is displayed - Drag you mouse over the crown - Observe the text - Change language of Discord - Re-drag you mouse over the crown, and see the text
